Generation I.Red: An aggressive Pok é mon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: An aggressive Pok é mon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
Generation I.Yellow: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.
Generation I.Stadium: Its horn is harder than diamond. If it punctures an enemy, it pumps powerful venom into the wound.

Generation II.Gold: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
Generation II.Silver: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.
Generation II.Crystal: It is easily agitated and uses its horn for offense as soon as it notices an attacker.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
Generation III.Sapphire: Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
Generation III.Emerald: Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
Generation III.FireRed: It is easily angered. By swinging its well-developed horn wildly, it can even punch through diamond.

Generation VIII.Sword: With a horn that's harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone .
Generation VIII.Shield: It's nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.

Generation III.LeafGreen: Safari Zone Trade Nidorina on Route 11

Generation IV.SoulSilver: Routes 13 , 14 , and 15 Safari Zone Night (Savannah, default)
